techmeme.title: Asana launches AI Studio in early access, a no-code tool for designing AI agents that can be integrated into teams' existing workflows (Radhika Rajkumar/ZDNET)
TollBit, which recently launched a content monetization marketplace for publishers and AI companies, raised a $24M Series A led by Lightspeed Ventures (Sara Fischer/Axios)

Unisys, Check Point, Avaya, and Mimecast to pay a combined $7M to the SEC, which says they negligently downplayed the impact of the SolarWinds supply chain hack (Lorenzo Franceschi-Bicchierai/TechCrunch)
Penguin Random House, UMG, and SAG-AFTRA join 11.5K+ signatories of an open letter saying the "unlicensed use of creative works" to train AI must not be allowed (Dan Milmo/The Guardian)
Source: Polymarket is making new checks to verify that users, especially big spenders, are not US-based; Fredi9999 has bet $18M+ on Republican outcomes so far (Emily Nicolle/Bloomberg)
